data.title: 16A Leningradskoe Shosse, Moscow, 125171
data.text:
This business centre strategically situated in a prime area of Moscow, and offers serviced offices at flexible, affordable prices. Here, the business centre is accessible 24 hours a day, so is well suited for any kind of business hours. The building comes with floor to ceiling windows, creating a fantastic working environment with an abundance of natural light to enhance focus and productivity. The offices come fully furnished, as turnkey solutions for you to set up your business's new home with ease. You can make full use of the meeting rooms, which provide an impressive space for you to convene collaborative projects.

The location

Ideally located only 3-minutes from the nearest underground station, this outstanding business centre is situated in a great location for commuting to and from the centre. Surrounding areas offer many local amenities for you to make use of, including a fine selection of restaurants and cafes. This location is perfect for companies who value convenience and accessibility- with many quality shops in walking distance to explore outside of work. Park Im. Vorovskogo is a short walk away, giving a fantastic, green space in which to spend well deserved breaks.

Baltiyskaya0.3 Km

Mtsk Likhobory4.4 Km

Sheremetyevo International Airport17.6 Km
